text: Nasr-e Basir(, "Clear Victory") is an Iranian Indigenous Smart Low-observable anti-ship cruise missile unveiled on 24 August 2014 in a defense exhibition in Tehran along with Ghadir missile, Karrar-4 MALE UAV and Mohajer-4 UAV. == References == ==See also== * Noor * Khalij Fars * Hormoz-2 Category:Weapons and ammunition introduced in 2014 Category:Anti-ship cruise missiles Category:Anti-ship missiles of Iran Category:Cruise missiles of Iran Category:Anti-ship missiles Category:Cruise missiles Category:Guided missiles of Iran Category:Anti-ship cruise missiles of Iran
title: Nasr-e Basir
